description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[A folder. With an illustration by R. Caton Woodville and a portrait.] The Absent-Minded Beggar", "Single Tales and Poems" Author: Kipling, Rudyard Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1865.c.8.(130.)", "British Library HMNTS 11647.g.74."
